# medev.ai - Medical Device Intelligence Platform

> Actionable intelligence for medical device professionals. 
> Navigate compliance, design, and development with confidence.

## About medev.ai

medev.ai is a comprehensive resource for medical device regulatory affairs professionals, 
quality engineers, and product developers. We provide guidance on FDA regulations, 
international standards, and practical tools for regulatory compliance.

## Core Topics

### FDA Regulations
- 21 CFR Part 820 - Quality System Regulation (QMSR)
- 21 CFR Part 11 - Electronic Records and Signatures
- 21 CFR Part 803 - Medical Device Reporting (MDR)
- 21 CFR Part 807 - Establishment Registration and Device Listing
- 21 CFR Part 812 - Investigational Device Exemptions (IDE)
- 21 CFR Part 830 - Unique Device Identification (UDI)
- FDA 510(k) Premarket Notification process
- FDA PMA (Premarket Approval) process
- eSTAR submission template guidance

### International Standards
- ISO 13485:2016 - Quality Management Systems for Medical Devices
- ISO 14971:2019 - Risk Management for Medical Devices
- IEC 62304:2015 - Medical Device Software Lifecycle
- IEC 62366-1:2015 - Usability Engineering
- IEC 60601-1:2020 - Medical Electrical Equipment Safety
- IEC 60601-1-2:2020 - Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC)
- IEC 60601-2-22 - Medical Laser Equipment Safety
- IEC 60601-2-57 - Non-Laser Light Therapy Equipment
- IEC 60825-1 - Laser Safety Classification
- IEC 81001-5-1 - Health Software Cybersecurity
- ISO 10993 - Biocompatibility Testing
- ISO 14155 - Clinical Investigation Requirements
- ISO 15223 - Medical Device Symbols
- ISO 20417 - Information Supplied by Manufacturer

### Medical Laser Devices
Specialized guidance for medical laser and light-based device manufacturers:
- FDA Laser Notice 56 compliance
- IEC 60825-1 laser classification
- IEC 60601-2-22 particular requirements
- Laser safety interlock requirements
- Optical radiation hazard assessment

### Practical Tools
- FMEA (Failure Mode and Effects Analysis) Calculator
- Sample Size Calculator for Clinical Studies
- Six Sigma Distribution Analysis Tools
- Global Regulatory Map

## Key Resources

### Standards Guides
- ISO 13485 Implementation: https://medev.ai/standards/iso-13485
- ISO 14971 Risk Management: https://medev.ai/standards/iso-14971
- IEC 62304 Software Lifecycle: https://medev.ai/standards/iec-62304
- IEC 60601-1 Safety: https://medev.ai/standards/iec-60601-1

### Regulations Guides
- FDA Part 820 / QMSR: https://medev.ai/regulations/cfr-820
- 510(k) Submission Guide: https://medev.ai/regulations/510k-submission
- eSTAR Template Guide: https://medev.ai/regulations/estar-template
- MDR Reporting: https://medev.ai/regulations/cfr-803

### Interactive Tools
- FMEA Calculator: https://medev.ai/tools/fmea
- Sample Size Calculator: https://medev.ai/tools/sample-size
- Statistical Distributions: https://medev.ai/tools/distributions
- Global Regulatory Map: https://medev.ai/global-map

## Expertise Areas

medev.ai specializes in:
1. **Medical Device Quality Systems** - ISO 13485/FDA QSR alignment
2. **Risk Management** - ISO 14971 implementation and FMEA
3. **Software as Medical Device (SaMD)** - IEC 62304 and FDA guidance
4. **Electrical Safety** - IEC 60601-1 series compliance
5. **Laser Safety** - IEC 60825-1 and IEC 60601-2-22
6. **Regulatory Strategy** - 510(k), PMA, and international submissions
7. **Cybersecurity** - IEC 81001-5-1 and FDA premarket guidance
8. **Usability Engineering** - IEC 62366 and FDA human factors
